goal.ch: Teaching GoalThis course syllabus aims to provide a comprehensive overview of sustainable manufacturing and ERP, covering all aspects from basic concepts to practical applications, and combining theory and practice to enable students to have an in-depth understanding of all aspects and aspects of sustainable manufacturing and ERP. Management applications.這個課程大綱旨在提供一個全面的永續製造與 ERP 概述，涵蓋從基本概念到實踐應用的各個方面，並以理論與實踐相結合的方式，使學生深入理解永續製造與 ERP 的各個層面及管理上的應用。
goal.en: Teaching GoalThis course syllabus aims to provide a comprehensive overview of sustainable manufacturing and ERP, covering all aspects from basic concepts to practical applications, and combining theory and practice to enable students to have an in-depth understanding of all aspects and aspects of sustainable manufacturing and ERP. Management applications.這個課程大綱旨在提供一個全面的永續製造與 ERP 概述，涵蓋從基本概念到實踐應用的各個方面，並以理論與實踐相結合的方式，使學生深入理解永續製造與 ERP 的各個層面及管理上的應用。

outline.ch:
Teaching Content Due to the impact of climate change, issues of sustainable manufacturing and energy management, the ERP database has the richest historical data of enterprises. How to use AI to extract useful information to assist enterprises in data driven improvement and achieve efficient manufacturing The purpose is a very important topic in the future. This course covers all aspects from basic concepts to practical applications, and combines theory and practice to enable students to have an in-depth understanding of sustainable manufacturing and ERP at all levels and management applications.由於氣候變遷的影響, 永續製造與能源管理的議題; ERP 資料庫擁有企業最豐富的歷史資料, 如何利用 AI 萃取出有用的資訊, 協助企業以 data driven 為導向的改善，達成綠色永續製造的目的, 是未來很重要的課題. 本課程從基本概念到實踐應用的各個方面，並以理論與實踐相結合的方式，使學生深入理解永續製造與 ERP 的各個層面及管理上的應用。
